name: ModMail Log Viewer
description: A simple webserver to view selfhosted logs

MONGO_URI.description: Mongodb connection uri that contains your modmail logs.

GUILD_ID.description: The ID of the guild this bot will be used in.

OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID.description: The ID of the bot, you can see it at the Discord developer bot page, under our super cool BloxTech team.

OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Not to be confused with the token, this is the application token itself, :))

TOKEN.description: The Discord bot token, you'll need it too for deploying the bot, so yes, :))
